title: BaDBoy v4.2 [Cheats 4 Counter-Strike 1.6]
description:
To start the cheat do this:

1) Open BaDBoY.exe
2) Press Load Hack button
3) Start Counter Strike and join a server
4) Press "end"-button to start cheat
5) Press "insert"-button to set up the cheat.
If you don&#039;t know how to move in the menu that comes up you scroll with your mouse-scroll to get down and up in the menu. To get in to a sub-menu, you press the left mouse button, and if you want to go back one step you press the right mouse button. As simple as that.
6) Press start-it in the menu to activate the hack
But if you will press "end" or "insert" you will start spam united cheaters homepage!!!

when you connect to the server change "camera" (normaly by pressing space button) some 5 times and screen will not be red but normal!

good luck by cheating
